description: The tangy and sharp lemon flavours in this dish compliment the smoky lobster meat.
keywords: Lobster dishes,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Lemon,Seafood,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Peanut free
name: BBQ Lobster with Lemon Butter & Garden Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium lobster tails, split in half lenghtways and sinue removed
160g mixed salad leaves, washed and drained
1 small red onion, peeled and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the butter with the juice and zest of the lemon.
Spread the lemon butter oven the meat inside the lobster tails and place in the BBQ.
Allow to cook for 12 minutes or until the lobster is cooked fully.
In a serving bowl, combine the salad leaves with the onion, tomatoes oil and balsamic and set aside.
Once the lobster is cooked, remove from the BBQ and serve with the garden salad.
